text:
Here's a fizz buzz one: <https://aphyr.com/posts/353-rewriting-the-technical-interview>
With a great quote: "“People always complain,” you murmur. “That Lisps have too many parentheses. What they _really_ mean is that their positions are too far to the left.”"

elements.text: Here's a fizz buzz one:
With a great quote: "“People always complain,” you murmur. “That Lisps have too many parentheses. What they
really
mean is that their positions are too far to the left.”"

text:
Criss stares at you for a long, long moment. “You never… you never wrote an actual _value_. You… do realize that the type system is meant to constrain _values_, right?”
“No,” you inform him, matter-of-factly. “No, that doesn’t sound right.”
He leans back in his chair, so far you think he may fall over, and rubs his forehead with both hands. You, who through _seidr_, have seen your rejection email already, know what he is about to say.
“We’ll be in touch.”

text: <@ULTB7E6UW> I will be in your debt for a long time.

elements.text: I will be in your debt for a long time.

text: "The interviewer—Criss, his badge says—is young, as is customary in the Valley. Wearing a hoodie which, judging from the lack of branding, cost at least three hundred dollars. He resembles no animal in particular, which gives you pause. Usually you’re better at that sort of thing."

elements.text: "The interviewer—Criss, his badge says—is young, as is customary in the Valley. Wearing a hoodie which, judging from the lack of branding, cost at least three hundred dollars. He resembles no animal in particular, which gives you pause. Usually you’re better at that sort of thing."

text:
I think my favorite has to be
```"In Lisp," you offer. "We often write domain-specific languages to solve new problems."

"C is not a DSL!"
"If you insist." Keep going anyway```

text: The point is, tech. interviews are ridiculous, and this viking/nordic programming deity is trying to land a job. So instead of just eating the ridiculous prompts and going along with it, they are one of those super geniuses who like can make an FP lang into a DSL of some imperitive lang and solve the problems super weirdly.
